1323112122122211221122121122221.content:
It takes a few seconds for the last words your new master had just said to register with you, and when they do, another flood of tears surges from your eyes.
You were going to be fixed. Your own dog was going to have you neutered. Your naked body collapses on the floor in despair and anger, before curling up in a fetal position and crying like a baby. Your master takes note, looking up from eating her breakfast and looks down at you.

"Oh, don't cry little one. You'll be alright, don't worry too much over it. After we finish our breakfasts, we'll get you cleaned up and ready for your big day." Your canine owner went back to eating calmly, leaving you to wallow and count down the time, frantically trying to think up how to convince her not to fix you, but your begging falls upon deaf ears.

After about ten more minutes, your owner gets up and washes her plate and your food bowl. She then promptly leads you to the bathroom, giving you a gentle, yet thorough scrubbing, paying special attention to your private area. You hardly pay any attention as thoughts about your past and future and how they had turned out had changed for you. Soon after, you were quickly dried off with a towel and your owner brought you to a small plastic kennel, the one you had carried her in when you took her to get her own operation years ago. Without much ceremony, your owner gingerly pushes you in as you struggle against her hand, but to no avail. She then locks the kennel door, leaving your small naked body trapped within it. Your push your hand out threw the bars, calling out to her. "No, please! Don't do this to me!!"

Your owner looks down between the bars of your cage and peers in at you, giving you a stern expression. Your begging is instantly converted into a fit of barking.
"Now now, settle down my pet. No use in making so much noise." She then picks up the kennel by the handle and takes you out to what used to be your car, putting you in the passenger seat and strapping in the kennel, then starts the engine and drives.

***

The drive to the vet was fairly short, but to you it felt like forever. You barked over and over in a futile display as she carried you and your kennel into the veterinarian clinic. You look around, seeing many other dogs and cats with cages, containing small humans, many of them frightened and bawling, much like you. Your owner walks up to the counter and talks to a desk clerk, not that you were paying any attention as you were too busy panicking. The clerk and your owner converse for a short while before the clerk smiles and points at a nearby door, instructing your owner to take you there. It would seem your master already has an appointment for you.

Your owner carries your kennel into the room and sits down in a chair next to the examination table, holding you and your kennel on her lap. She sees you shaking in fear and anticipation and decides to talk to you.

"Come on, little one, it's not going to be that bad. It'll hurt for awhile and then you'll be fine. Like ripping off a bandage, quick and mostly painless." She pauses, then continues, lowering her head to get closer to you. "And I hope you know this isn't personal, this is not for revenge. I just simply can't risk letting you make human puppies all the time. Plus, I hope that without the distraction of hormones and testosterone, you will be a better and more obedient pet. I'm sure you understand."

Just as she finishes, a somewhat tall, slim German Shepherd walks into the room, sporting a lab coat walks in, looking at your owner. "Well, hello there, ma'am. How are you today?" After a bit of idle chitchat between the two giant anthro dogs, the German Shepherd vet flips through a clipboard in hand. "So, says here that you're here to get your human fixed today." The vet looks at the cage containing your naked, shivering body, and lets out a joking chuckle. "Well, this will be the fourth one I've done today and I have five more after this appointment. Busy day. May as well get started now. Ma'am, can you remove it from its kennel, please, and place him right over here", pointing at the table.

Your owner nods and unlocks the kennel door, and picks you up, despite your squirming. She gently places you on the cold, stainless steel table, restraining you enough with her hands so you cannot escape. Your voice is still barks as the doctor looks over a series of medical tools before settling on a syringe filled with a clear liquid. You struggled and barked beggingly until the moment you dreaded finally arrived.

The German Shepherd walked slowly to the table, holding the syringe and looming over you. Being careful not to hurt you, he sticks the needle into your scrotum and pushes down the plunger. The liquid, a painkiller, soon takes effect. A few moments later, the vet picks up a scalpel, visibly sharp and shining in the light. Terrified but powerless, you finally give in to your owner's wishes and stop fighting in her grasp, looking up at her dog-headed face pathetically. You then close your eyes helplessly as the German Shepherd makes an incision in your now immune-to-pain ball sac. After a two more quick and precise cuts, each releasing a testicle from your sac, the giant dog of a doctor takes your now useless balls, placing them in a small container and giving them to your owner, who smiles a bit, thanking the vet. You continue to sit there and cry as the doctor bandages up the wound, before taking his payment and walking back out into the lobby, likely to begin preparing to work on his next client's pet.

Your master soothes you by petting your head, seeing you visibly shaken and devastated, and more than a little sore. "There, there, little one. I promise you in time you'll learn to forget them. It's for the best. You're my pet and I know what is best for you. Come one, let's go home." She then gingerly picks you up, mindful of your bandaged area, and places you back into your kennel for the trip home. During the car ride back, you think of all the things that have happened to you over the last few days, feeling dejected and miserable, but also, feeling a strange wave of approval at your dog's actions, and you wonder just how much she is altering your mind.

A few minutes later, you arrive back at home, where your mistress decides...

Your owner is still essentially a canine and probably retained some of those tendencies. It was worth a shot anyway you figured. With that thought, you slyly pull back on the leash, not enough to tug though and give away your position, scooping up the ball quickly, holding it behind you and running back up alongside her again, as if nothing had happened.

As you sit on the other end of the couch you look over at Max. He's relaxing and watching TV now until you speak up, "Max?" He lets out a soft ruff sound, turning his head to you, giving you his attention now. "I've decided I'd like to stay with you now." He nods, giving you a level look and then responding, "Very well but if you agree to stay here you'll have to become my pet. I will be your owner from now on, is that understood?" You look a bit shocked, having hoped that he'd be a bit more reasonable, "b-but Max, I don't want to be anyone's pet!" He shakes his head, "I'm only doing this in order to protect you, especially if we're downtown. If you want to stay with me runt you'll have to agree to wearing my collar and do anything I say. Also you'll be leashed if we're out and about. I can't afford to pay fines right now, money is tight as it is."

You guess that makes sense and don't really want to be a burden on him, not after he tried to help you anyway. "Oh..o-okay Max, I'll be your pet". He looks down at you, with a look that seems different from before, then getting up and trotting off, returning with a black studded collar that he used to wear. He looms over you now, powerfully built, leaning down and securing the collar around your neck. He locks it on too so you can't even remove it if you wanted to. He let's out a booming laugh, holding the I.D. tag up, reading it aloud, "Runt, property of Max the doberman." He then takes his seat on the other end of the couch again, watching TV. "..I don't know about this Max, I feel kind of uncomfortable, take it back off please." He glances your way, but with a slightly more firm look than before, "look runt, you agreed to be my pet, that means from on you belong to me, you're my property and I have the final say on things." You glare at him, "..and stop calling me runt! Max, I'm way older than you are even!" You say with sudden irritation, forgetting momentarily about your place in the world now. He just chuckles and you see him growing larger as well as he shrinks you down to a foot and a half tall, "Oh? That may be, but I'm still bigger than you and you agreed to be my pet, now hush, I'm trying to watch TV."

You feel defeated, hoping things would be different with him but nothing seems to have changed. You sulk a bit at the other end of the couch, although your thoughts are interrupted as you feel Max's warm padded feet pushing into the side of your leg as he gets comfy, laying across the couch, treating you exactly as you are now. Just a pet.

Sweet is a purebred Siberian Husky. You raised her from a puppy after you found her in the alley of your local Wal-Mart. You two have been best friends ever since.

"There you are. Did you miss me?" All you got was another excited bark. "I'll take that as a yes. Are you hungry?" She barked excitedly and ran over to her food bowl. You poured a good amount of dog food into the bowl and went over to your computer. You watched her eat as it booted up. When she finished eating, she began to shudder violently. "Oh my God are you ok?" You yell as you run over to her. You hug her and hold her tightly against your own body. Suddenly, the shaking stopps and Sweet begins to go limp in your arms. "What!?! Please be alright, please be alright." You say, fearing the worst. You bring your ear to her body and still hear a heartbeat. "Oh thank God." You say, relieved. You go set Sweet on the couch and sit by her. Suddenly, you begin to feel drowsy, "Oohhh man. Jeez, a I guess all that worry really tuckered me out." You say as you fall asleep next to Sweet on the couch.
13233211.title: Mine

132332111.content:
"Yaaaaawwwn. That was a good nap. Where's Sweet?" You say to yourself. "She must be in her. Bed...." You trail off at the sight before you. In place of Sweet, was a humanoid fluffy being the size of if not bigger that you sitting next to you. "Oh shit! What the fuck are you!?!" Your instincts taking over and immediately causing a state of panic. The humanoid flinched and began to sob loudly at the sound of your harsh words. You stare at the humanoid, confused and unsure of what to do next. You eventually slide over next to the humanoid and begin to comfort it. You don't say anything and wait for the humanoid to calm down. "I'm sorry I scared you." The humanoid said, breaking the silence. The voice sounded very sweet and feminine, indicating that it was a girl. And from your observations, albeit brief, showed that she was covered in black and white hair or fur of some kind. Slowly the realization comes to you.

"Oh my God you ARE Sweet!" You yell out in revelation. What you think is Sweet flinches as the loud and sudden noise but immediately recovers, a face filled with joy replaced that of sorrow. She hugs you tightly, your faces being brought together side by side in the embrace. Once she lets go, you grab her by the shoulders and begin to look her over. She was now very obviously bipedal, having hands instead of front paws but still having digitgrade lower legs like regular dogs have. She had a very feminine, curvaceous, and voluptuous body. Having a thin but proportionate waist, watermelon sized breasts, and a waist just as wide. "Uhhh, I don't know what so say." You finally say after you take all of the events that have just transpired in. "What do you mean?" Sweet says in reply. "I don't know. Like. How did you become a humanoid creature? How can you speak and understand English? Or better yet, why do you have such a great body?" You say, increasing in volume as the questions went on. "I have about as much of an idea as you master." Master? Did she just call you master? "What did you call me?" You ask. "I called you master. Master." She replied joyfully. You stand up, trying to get a hold of what is going on. She stands up with you, when she walks over to you, it is plain to see that she is taller than you. At least eight inches taller. You look up at her with a confused and concerned look on your face. And she returns the look with a reassuring smile. She hugs you again, this time the lower half of your face being buried in her ginormous bosom.

"One minute. Stay here." You say as you briskly walk back to your room. While in your room, you grab out your biggest and stretchyest clothes you had in your dresser and closet, which just happened to be a big white T-shirt and some sweatpants. "Put these on." You say to her as you extend your clothes towards her. She looks at the clothes confusingly but takes them After a few seconds. Once she starts to put the T-shirt on upside down you decide to help her. "No silly, like this." You say as you flip the shirt over and get her head through the head hole. "Now put your arms through these other holes." She follows that precisely. "Do you think you can do the pants by yourself?" You ask her. "I think so." She replies. She gets one leg through but falls over onto her enormous rump when she tries to get her other leg in. You snicker at her as she gets the other leg through on the floor. The clothes weren't a perfect fit, but they covered what needed to be covered. "Do I have to keep these on? They are a little tight." She says. "Yes you do." You reply slightly sternly.
132332111.title: 4 hours later.

choices: Show her the wonders of the computer.
1323321111.content:
"I'm going to the store to get you some more appropriate clothing." You say, going to grab your jacket. "Can I come with you master?" She asks. "No." You say back. "Pleeeaaaase?" She says, starting to do her begging face that you couldn't resist. "Oohh. Fine. But you have to keep those clothes on until we get back." You say, giving in to that adorable face of hers. "Deal." She says.

On the way to the women's clothing store, Sweet had to lay down in the way back to avoid arousing suspicion. "Master? Why do I have to be back here? I usually sit up front with you. "I would let you be up here. But I'm pretty sure that a big fluffy anthropomorphic dog in my passenger seat would raise some red flags to most people." You say calmly. "Oh. Ok." She replies sadly. You look back at her in the rear view mirror to see her disappointed.

"Ok, we're here." You say, pulling into the parking lot of the Wall Mart where you first met Sweet. "You are going to have to stay here Sweet. Until we know what is going on or if there are more like you, I can't let other people see you." You say, concerned for her safety. She compiles again and you leave for the store. You find a bunch of womens t-shirts, jeans, underwear, and even a big sweatshirt for if she gets cold. At the cash register, the cashier asks you about all the women's clothing you were going to buy. "That for your daughter?" The cashier asks. "Yeah, you could say that. Big growth spurt over the past few weeks." You reply, and technically, you weren't lieing. "Ok then. That will be 389 dollars and fifty cents." The cashier said. "Really? Geez. Ok." You reply, slightly groveling while you pull out you wallet and pay the cashier.

When you arrive back at your car, you see Sweet in the passenger seat, jamming out to some music. "What did I tell you?" You say as you open the car door, slightly angry with her. "Oh, sorry master. It is just so boring waiting for you to get back." She says back, slowly making her way back into the back seat. "You are fine. I don't think anyone saw you. And either way. I could never stay mad at you." You say as you start to pull away.

When you arrive back at your apartment you rush Sweet back inside and lock the door behind you. "Ok take these and go put them on. Not all of them at once, just one outfit." You say, handing the bags of clothes to Sweet. "Ok master." She replies joyfully as she runs back to the bedroom. How could things get to this? Yesterday, Sweet was just your average dog. Really playful, excited, energetic, and loving. Now, she is a, dimwitted, anthropomorphic version of herself. "Uhh, master? Can you come help me with this?" She hollers. "Be right there." You holler back. On your way to the bedroom, you expected her to be trying to put her shirt on upside down again. But when you got there, she was nowhere to be found.

"Sweet? Where did you go?" You ask the open air. You step into the room farther, but when you do, you are tackled from behind. It was Sweet. You get up to find Sweet completely dressed, nothing seeming to be out of place. She was wearing the grey T shirt and skinny jeans that you bought her. "Wait a minute. How did you--?" You began. "Wait, pants drop em'" To which she complied. She had her underwear on right. "Now shirt, bring it up." She raised up her shirt in compliance. Not a stitch out of place. "Ok. How did you do this by yourself?" You ask in awe. "I don't know, one second, I'm standing here with this bra in my hands thinking: 'How do you put one of these things on?' Then the next, I know exactly how to do it. It just kind of happened." She says back. "Do they fit alright?" You ask, hoping for a yes so you wouldn't have to spend more money. "They fit perfect, just, the bra feels a little weird." She says groping her breasts. "Just, not used to wearing one I guess
1323321111.title: Go to the clothing store

You pour some seeds into a little bowl, and do the same with some water, and place them inside her cage. Your canary, seemingly overtaken by a ravenous hunger, quickly devours all the seeds, then wolfs down all the water.

Suddenly, she begins to shiver, and you take her out of her cage and hold her against your chest to offer some comfort. However, she begins to slowly puff up in your grip, and begins to grow larger and larger! Shocked by this sight, you collapse onto your sofa and faint as your canary reaches a foot tall...

You slowly awake, your eyes closed, and attempt to move, but feel a feathery appendage gently pushing you back, and that same appendage begins to lightly stroke your forehead. A soft, feminine, almost lyrical voice says "Are you alright,...

13311111111.content:
You decide to be brave and answer the door. You're no chicken! You're a canary! You reach for the door handle. You're scared but decide to turn the knob anyway.

"HEY! OPEN UP WILL YA?" You are now the landlord. Your name is David Wave. You're getting a little annoyed at your renter. He should be home watching TV, right? You don't know and you don't care. You're here for one purpose: get your money. After tapping You're foot impatiently for a minute, you decide to knock again. However, just as you go to knock, the door opens and a... ... ...bird? Yeah, a bird is standing there.
"Um, h-h-hello sir. C-can I help you?" she asks in a singsong voice. You lift your trucker hat and scratch your baldspot.
Then put the hat back on and say, "Good grief, what is the world coming to? Look I don't mean to be rude or nothing but what is with that garnish costume? If you're waiting for Halloween, you're gonna be waiting a while."
She stares at you with a strange look. "Costume?", she looks down at herself a second then back at you. "Oh right! My bird costume! So sorry, I forgot I was even wearing it!"
"Well whatever, just don't get feathers all over my house. Which reminds me, is (your name) home? I need my money for their rent ya see."
"Oh! You're Mr. Wave? I expected someone... taller? Nevermind I'll get the money for you."

You close the door before Mr. Wave can say anything else. "Um, master, where's Mr. Wave's money?", you ask your beak. You had hid your master under your tongue to hide him from whoever was knocking at the door. To both you and your master's surprise, it worked! Probably due to the fact that Mr. Wave wasn't all that smart.
"Ummm, I think I put it in my room by the dresser" your master responds.
"Thank you!" you say as you go get the money.

You stand outside for another 2 minutes, when finally the bird-dressed-lady comes back to open the door. "'Bout friggen' time miss!" you say as you grab the money. You wave goodbye, hop back in your car and drive away. Man that bird lady was weird!

You close the door once again. "Hoooooooo!" you sigh a slight tune from your beak. "Now where were we?" you say sliding your master out from under your tongue. "Oh yeah, I remember"

Swallow (Melody's POV)

13311111112.content:
You decide to shrink. Wait what? You can't shr-. At that moment you realize that everything around you is now enormous. You begin to panic when a knock at the door snaps you out of it. You jump in the cage and hide in your bird house. Just as the front door opened, you felt your master squirm in your beak. You opened your beak, grabbed them, and held them in your open hand.
"What is going on out here?" they whispered.
"Someone's in the nest!" you whisper-shout back
"Who?"
"I don't know?! He was kinda short, plump, and rude."
"Oh god."
"What?"
"Did he have a trucker hat?"
"Yeah."
"Oh god, its my landlord. What's he doing out in the rain?"
"What rain?"
"What do you mean 'what rain'?"
"There was a storm outside, but it disappeared after I grew, and you shrunk."
"But that storm started only an hour before that. That's pretty... ok, its not weird, exactly, but it is pretty suspicious. Oh wait, shh, he's coming over here!"
Sure enough, the landlord was peeking into the cage. You hide quickly cupping your feathered hand over your master. You toot a slight song to make it seem like everything is normal. The landlord walks away grumbling to himself. You sigh in relief. Suddenly the cage begins to swing back and forth. You through your arms out to steady yourself. Wait. Oh no your master! You dropped him! Now you can't find him! The cage is brought outside and set down in the bed of the truck.
"He wants to take my money? Then I'll take his canary. Hehehe, that's a good one." the landlord then throws a tarp over the cage and gets in his truck.
"Oh, come on! Give me a break!" you shout.

You are now the "master" once again. That is to say you are you again. You were tossed through the air by your pet, and friend, canary. You know she didn't mean it, but now you lost her! You stand up and rub your head. You are in the back of a truck. An empty bird cage lays on its side to the left. You look at yourself. Your back to being the size you were before Melody shrunk, but not your full height. Great. You walk over to the edge of the tailgate, which is pulled down, and see a set of boot prints leading into a shack, you mean, house. You put together all the pieces of what must have happened. You begin scratching your head when suddenly you are picked up by your shoulders. Your about to scream when a familiar voice shouts at you. You look up hoping to see Melody, but instead a crow face greets you. It caws and drops you. You scream as you plummet toward a hole in the roof of the house. As you land, you pass out.
13311111112.title: Quick, shrink!

133111111121.content:
You are now Melody. You were taken into this strange house and put in a nonworking (hopefully) oven. You can see out the glass but just barely. The landlord hasn't seemed to notice that you are an anthro. You still don't know if that's good or not. After looking around the oven you noticed a pipe leading upward. You know from experience that its too small to climb up. You tried. So instead you shouted out of it. After a while you heard a slight bang, but nothing else happened. The oven is cold, the air is hot, and your trapped in the house of some guy. Assuming you could escape, your master is still missing. It's hopeless! You only wish you knew how to shrink again. Then you could fit up that pipe. You sigh and look at your surroundings for the hundredth time. Wait. How did everything get bigger? Nevermind that, to the pipe fast! You flew over to the rusty pipe your so small now, you could fly up to the top of the pipe! You jump and begin to ascend.

You open your eyes slowly. Your entire body is in pain. You roll over and sit up, hearing several popping noises from your body. How high did that bird drop you? You think about it for a second until you feel feathers wrap around you. You panic and break away, only to hear Melody's voice.
"Its ok. I'm here now", you turn to see Melody, at the same size as you, looking at you with a worried look.
"Melody? Is it really you? How did you find me?" you ask.
"Well actually, you found me."
"What? What do you mean?"
"I was flying to the top of a pipe that led outside. I squeezed through the rectangular cuts in side of the top part of the pipe. I was going to go find you immediately, but then I heard moaning and saw you next to the pipe! I was both worried and happy! After that I flew you here in this tree."
"Oh, well I just kinda got kidnapped by a normal bird and dropped through the air."
"Oh my! Are you ok?"
"Yeah I'm just a little sore. Hey, how did you get this small?"
"Oh, well... I don't really know. I guess I shrunk. But that's enough of that. Should we go home? I've had enough adventuring for one day, haven't you?

1331111111211.content:
You decide to go home. No more adventures, you were done with those for now. Besides, weren't you and Melody in the middle of something?
"I say we go home." You say.
"Alright, climb on." Melody points to her back and you look at her surprised.
"Um..."
"Oh, right, here." she jumps from the tree ad within a second, is bird-sized again. She comes flying back and scoops you into her mouth in one swift motion. After you get comfortable on here tongue, she opens here mouth and lets you see that she's returned to being 5 feet tall. The house is also right in front of her. The door was still wide open from earlier today. She walks inside and goes in your backroom. There she grabs another cage and walks back outside. She closes her mouth and you are again in darkness. What's she planning?

You close your beak as you go back outside. You wonder? You think about how you wish the house was small. You blink, and when you open your eyes, the house was small. You can't believe it! You have the power of shrinking and growing things! So cool! A movement on your tongue reminds you of something. You chuckle, lift your head up high, and swallow. A lump begins traveling down your throat. You breathe out happily, your tongue laying outside your beak, and your eyes droop slightly. You then rub your stomach. You can't wait to feel them in there. The lump begins to disappear into your chest. You smile lovingly and swallow again. You feel the lump disappear into your chest completely. They'll be safe inside you.
1331111111211.title: You were in the middle of something!

She stands up straight and rests her feathered hand on her stomach. "So good," she says out loud. She pats her belly a few times before walking over to the cage. She places the house in the cage and then shrinks the cage. When the cage is about an inch tall, she picks it up and places it in her mouth. It's not as tasty as her master was, but she doesn't care. Melody shrinks herself to bird size again and flies toward a nearby lake she heard earlier from the bed of the truck. When she arrives, Melody plucks the cage from her mouth, and puts it in a hole in a tree near the lake. She then grows it back to normal cage size. The house within is now the perfect size for her master, while she sleeps in the cage. Speaking of her master, he is currently asleep within her gut. She rests a hand on it and smiles. After that, Melody notices a truck come by with Mr. Wave inside. She smiles evilly this time and shrinks the truck to ant sized. Melody flies over, plucks the truck up, and holds it in front of her face.

Inside, Mr. Wave is freaking out. "WHAT THE HECK IS GOING ON HERE!"

"Well hello there Mr. Wave! It's me, Melody. Remember me?" Melody asks in her happy sing-song voice.

"Hey! You can talk!"

"So I'm dreaming?"
"Hehe, nope try again."
"Wait, you mean this is real?"
"That's not the only thing this means."
"What else does it mean?"
"You'll see."

Melody winks at Mr. Wave. Then opens her beak, and places the truck inside. She closes her beak and flies up to the cage. Once there, she opens her mouth and places the tiny truck under her wing feathers, hidden from view. She then starts bringing up her master from her crop. Once out she puts him on the porch of their home. She grabs the truck, licks her beak, and opens the truck door. Mr. Wave is too shocked and confused to move, and so when Melody tips the truck's door toward her open beak, Mr. Wave is sent falling into her mouth. Melody tastes him all over and sends him to her stomach. She traces his body down her own with a feathery finger. When he slips past her crop and into her stomach, Melody lets out a small burp. 13311111112112.title: Living like Birds

133111111121122.content:
Master turns over on the wood porch and goes back to sleep facing away from Melody. Melody sighs in relief and looks at her stomach. Mr. Wave is currently smaller than even Master ever was. Melody thinks for a moment on how to change this so she can feel him squirm. She then closes her eyes and concentrates on her meal and grows it. When she opens her eyes again her stomach is slightly bulging outward. Mr. Wave is struggling harder now that he has less room to move. Melody rolls her tongue out of her beak as her stomach begins digesting Mr. Wave. She shrinks herself down so that she is a little taller than Master and picks him up off the porch. Melody opens the door, walks into Master's bedroom and places him on his bed. With Mr. Wave beginning to soften inside her, Melody walks to the living-room and lays on the couch. Mr. Wave finally stopped struggling after a few minutes of gurgling away in her gut. Melody was always a skinny canary, but after digesting such a meal, Melody gained a couple pounds. She rubbed her belly and licked her beak in satisfaction. Melody smiled happily, closed her eyes, and went to sleep on the couch. Before sleeping though, Melody grew herself just enough to have her feet over the edge of the couch.

When Master woke up, he noticed it was very dark outside his window, yet a clock on the side of the wall read 11:37. He assumed that meant morning since yesterday was quite an adventure. He leaned up, yawned, and smelled something being cooked in the kitchen. Master walked in the kitchen and was surprised to see a seemingly 10feet tall Melody cooking pancakes and bacon. She had to crouch to do so.

Melody hummed as she cooked. She had never made human food, but she was trying. She had found an old generator in the backroom and so that gave the house power. She wanted to try a piece of bacon but waited until Master woke up. She had also thought about shrinking back down to a size this house could handle but then thought against it. Her surprise would be ruined if she did that! Suddenly a gurgle came from her belly, she smiled and placed a wing on it.
"Are you hungry?" Melody jumped a little at the sound of her master's voice, losing a feather in the pancake she was cooking.
"Dang it"
"What's up?"
"You made me bump my head and lose a feather. Now its in the pancake."
"Ewww. I'm sorry Melody. I didn't think I would spook you."
"No, it's fine. I'll just pull it out... there, see? Good as new!"
"But don't birds have gross germs in their feathers?"
"What are you trying to say?"
"Nothing, sorry. By the way, how is it still dark outside?"
"Oh! Our cage is in a hollow tree. And the house is in the cage. I even found us a truck for when you need to go bye groceries. Now do you want some breakfast?"
"Yes please!"

*Some time later*

"Man, breakfast was good! By the way Melody, what happened to that pancake the feather was in?"
"Oh, I ate it. It and the bacon went great with my meal I had last night."
"Oh yeah? What did you eat last night? I noticed you were a bit chubbier." Master pats her stomach as Melody takes his plate.
Melody froze for a second before responding. How would Master take the truth? Should she lie?

1331121111.content:
It was a stormy night, the wind and rain hitting the sides of your home hard. An occasional boom of thunder and flash of lightning occurred in the storm. You sat by the window, looking out. This storm brought you back some old memories; old memories of your pet. About four years ago, a storm similar to this had fallen in your area. You were caught in the middle of it walking home. The grocery store was not far from your home, so you figured you could make it before it fell. Boy were you wrong. Just as you got to your front door, you heard something rustle in your bushes. After placing the newly purchased food you drop down and look into the bushes. What you saw almost made you jump back up.

A week ago a delivery truck containing animals for a local zoo crashed. Some of the cages and crates inside became open, but the caretakers got most of them.
